mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.order_code AS "orderCode", a.starthouid AS "startHouse.id", ch.name AS "startHouse.name", a.endhouid AS "endHouse.id", cho.name AS "endHouse.name", a.storeid AS "goods.id", cg.name AS "goods.name", cg.sj AS "goods.sj", cg.cbj AS "goods.cbj", cg.tm AS "goods.tm", cg.big AS "goods.big.id", cuna.name AS "goods.big.name", cg.zong AS "goods.zong.id", cunb.name AS "goods.zong.name", cg.small AS "goods.small.id", cunc.name AS "goods.small.name", cg.specid AS "goods.spec.id", csp.name AS "goods.spec.name", SUM(a.nub) AS "nub", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", su.name AS "createBy.name", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.cbj AS "cbj", a.xsj AS "xsj", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"

LEFT JOIN c_goods cg ON a.storeid=cg.id LEFT JOIN c_house ch ON a.starthouid=ch.id LEFT JOIN c_house cho ON a.endhouid=cho.id LEFT JOIN c_unit cuna ON cg.`big`=cuna.`id` LEFT JOIN c_unit cunb ON cg.`zong`=cunb.`id` LEFT JOIN c_unit cunc ON cg.`small`=cunc.`id` LEFT JOIN c_spec csp ON cg.`specid`=csp.`id` LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON su.id=a.create_by
mapper.select: SELECT a.order_code AS "orderCode", a.del_flag AS "delFlag" FROM c_ykinfo a WHERE a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND LENGTH(trim(a.order_code)) > 0 GROUP BY a.order_code
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO c_ykinfo( id, order_code, starthouid, endhouid, storeid, nub, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, cbj, xsj, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{orderCode}, #{startHouse.id}, #{endHouse.id}, #{goods.id}, #{nub}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{cbj}, #{xsj}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE c_ykinfo SET order_code = #{orderCode}, starthouid = #{startHouse.id}, endhouid = #{endHouse.id}, storeid = #{goods.id}, nub = #{nub}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, cbj = #{cbj}, xsj = #{xsj}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
